title: Account Manager - Full Time
job_overview:
We are looking for a dedicated and professional Account Manager to support our team by managing existing client relationships and onboarding new clients. The ideal candidate will have excellent communication skills, strong organizational abilities, and a passion for delivering exceptional customer service.

Responsibilities:

* Serve as the primary point of contact for both existing and new clients
* Maintain and strengthen client relationships through regular communication
* Handle onboarding for new clients, guiding them through our services and processes
* Address client inquiries, concerns, and requests promptly and professionally
* Collaborate with internal teams to ensure client needs are met effectively
* Monitor account activity and provide proactive recommendations to clients
* Facilitate contract renewals and identify opportunities for upselling
* Keep accurate records of client interactions and account status  

Requirements:

* Proven experience in account management, customer service, or client relations
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills in English
* Strong organizational and problem-solving skills
* Ability to manage multiple accounts simultaneously
* Reliable internet connection and a suitable remote workspace
